### Field Notes
- Standard summer conditions at all stations
- Stream clarity good, visible substrate at WQ-01
- Cr at WQ-03: 62 µg/L recorded

### Compliance Flags
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-03 (62 µg/L) approaching MCL threshold (100 µg/L)

### Events
- WQ-02 turbidity probe cleaned, biofouling removed
- Canoe rental advisory posted for WQ-05 reach
- Automated sampler WQ-03 battery replaced

### Notes
- Day 21 monitoring. Cr spatial gradient: WQ-01(2), WQ-02(2), WQ-03(62), WQ-04(39.1), WQ-05(26.5), WQ-06(17.0). Compliance review in progress.
